content.text: Trial 5/5, Stage 'xtraverse': Please describe the image and compute the stiffness matrix.

The image depicts a segment of a 3D-printed structure with an angled groove. The red circle highlights the groove, which appears to be primarily oriented along the X-axis.

### Stiffness Matrix
```json
{
  "stiffness_matrix": [
    [250, 0, 0],
    [0, 100, 0],
    [0, 0, 100]
  ]
}
```
